NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to History and Graduate or the cell corresponding to Arts and Postdoc?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Arts} and {Postdoc} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Biology and Graduate or the cell corresponding to Biology and Sophomore?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Biology} and {Sophomore} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Biology and Faculty or the cell corresponding to Chemistry and Senior?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Biology} and {Faculty} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Geography and Faculty or the cell corresponding to Economics and Sophomore?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Economics} and {Sophomore} has a higher heat value.
